channel.title: Two Shopping allies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Two Shopping allies"

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know if you can get Larry from appraise all, or does it have to be something like 50 tiles and nothing else?

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded:
One is obtained by selling over 10 thousand in items at once.

Please note that Haro is gotten by selling over 10K in items in one button click. That means that if you sell 4 Ninja Dogs, you only get 10K and therefor do not get Haro. Also, the entire 10K has to be gotten in one button click. You can't, for example, sell 2 Ninja Dogs and 2 Ninja Puppets to get her.

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded: Yeah, on my alt, i heard that you get larry from mass appraising.

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded:
One is obtained by selling over 10 thousand in items at once. The other ally people think is related to appraising since Haro affect appraising.
Haro is based of the show Wolf and Spice and Increases Treasure prices by 5% of maximum value.

For the latest info go here.

*Edit*
The other ally has been found, his name is Larry and his ability is the same as Haro. He is given when you appraise 50 items or more at one go.

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded: Yeh i wish someone would know. I agree on the fact it will be urahara's help. Who eles would be gotten by shopping? Im trrying to think about if anyone from naruto works at a shop?

item.title: Re: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded: I'm not sure about them, its a Light Hour right now and I'm not getting anything. I'm guessing its going to be something weird like a purchase order or a tiny hidden button. Meh, I'm guessing they're going to be based on Urahara's shop-help. We're just going to have to wait and see I guess.

item.title: Two Shopping allies
item.content:encoded: Has anyone found out anything about these two? I was thinking they pop up during dark or Light Hour.
